author: Simon1717
title: The Perfect Location!!
text:
I didn’t really do much research so we completely lucked out on this hotel I just looked for a Central Rome location as was told most things are within walking distance.
Although the rooms could do with a little TLC everything was in good order, clean warm and had everything we needed including free wifi to keep the world updated on our Rome travels.
The bed was slightly on the hard side which I don’t really mind but the other half found this uncomfortable, the location of the hotel made it nice and quiet at night as we were just off the road.
Breakfast was really good with so many options available from fresh fruit and yogurt to hot options. We really enjoyed the breakfast times as well as most hotels stop breakfast at 9/930 in true laid back Italian style breakfast was available until 10:30!
We didn’t eat in the restaurant connected to the hotel however 10% discount and a free bottle of wine was offered to us, however we did stop by the hotel bar one night!
Check out was mid day giving us plenty of time to shower, eat and pack with no rush or fuss involved.
The location of this hotel is second to none with great shopping literally around the corner and the Trevi fountain pretty much on your doorstep, Pantheon and Spanish step just a 10min walk away!
Top tip hit the cafe/restaurant Oggi Roma Gourmet opposite the hotel for light bites and drinks.
